Text:
works well.
game money is euro's, not dollars lol

Try options and check if it's possible to change to dollars..

if not.. Amount does not change with the currency so it doesn't really matter :P

Almost forgot:
I checked, and yes, it's possible to change it to dollars. When in a game, go to options and you'll see the dropdown box. There are multiple currencies available.
Is it possible to save the games you played?

yes ofcourse, why else would I upload it? :P

It is possible that you have to run it in compatibility mode windows XP SP3, because it can get stuck in vista/7 sometimes
10/10 awesome and thx for the instructions lol. awesome!
